title: Adelaide: Majestic Minima Hotel
inclusions_evidence: INCLUSIONS: Accommodation and bonuses as specified; IMPORTANT INFORMATION: International and domestic flights are not included, please add best available airfare.

other.notes: The deal page lists 'bonuses as specified' but does not detail them. No external price data (hotel or flights) could be reliably sourced from the provided materials, so DIY component prices are left null.

reasoning: The helloworld offer is a land-only 3-night stay at Majestic Minima Hotel for 213 per person (426 for two). The page explicitly states flights are not included. Without the ability to access booking.com/expedia/supplier pages from the provided data, I cannot reliably compute DIY costs, so numeric DIY comparisons are null. Given the low package price for 3 nights in a budget 'mini-room' property, this appears to be reasonably good value for travellers who do not require flights or large rooms; rating reflects likely good value but uncertainty due to unspecified bonuses and lack of external price verification.
additional_notes: If you want a quantified comparison, provide permission to fetch live hotel and flight prices or supply the booking.com/expedia supplier links so I can compute exact DIY totals and update savings.
